page.title: 07JOBS
page.content: A selection of local jobs: TEACHER:A teacher teaches a variety of subjects to different aged pupils. POSTMAN:A postman delivers our letters and parcels. MILKMAN:A Milkman is responsible for delivering our daily bread and dairy produce. BUILDER:A builder builds houses etc. and also does repairs PLUMBER:A plumber mends leaks and broken pipes. BUTCHER:A butcher sells all different kinds of meat,e.g:pork,beef,lamb,etc. DUSTMAN:A dustman collects our rubbish and transports it to a tip. GROCER:A grocer sells all different types of household products. DENTIST:A dentist examines and takes care of our teeth. By Andrew Burton
